rows.name: Project Planning
rows.description:
Project Planning Phase

This phase involves initial planning and requirement gathering.

  • Define project scope
  • Identify stakeholders
  • Create project timeline

rows.name: Requirements Analysis
rows.description:
Requirements Analysis

Detailed analysis of project requirements including:

  1. Functional requirements
  2. Non-functional requirements
  3. Technical constraints

Note: This is a critical phase that requires stakeholder input.

rows.name: Resource Planning
rows.description:
Resource Planning

Planning and allocation of resources for the project.

Proper resource planning is key to project success.

rows.name: Development Phase
rows.description:
Development Phase

Main development activities including:

  • Frontend development
  • Backend development
  • Database design
  • API development

rows.name: Frontend Development
rows.description:
Frontend Development

Development of user interface components using modern frameworks.

Technologies: React, TypeScript, CSS3

rows.name: Backend Development
rows.description:
Backend Development

Server-side development and API creation.

Key components:

  • REST API endpoints
  • Authentication system
  • Data validation
  • Error handling

rows.name: Testing Phase
rows.description:
Testing Phase

Comprehensive testing of the application including:

Test TypeStatus
Unit TestingIn Progress
Integration TestingPending
User Acceptance TestingPending

rows.name: Deployment
rows.description:
Deployment

Final deployment to production environment.

Deployment checklist:

  • Environment setup
  • Database migration
  • SSL certificate configuration
  • Monitoring setup
